name: Healix
description:
As a rich scientist, it was natural for you to do radioactive experimentation on your pet dog, but now he's all kinds of jacked up and you need to fix him!

This game was a submission for the Global Game Jam 2020. Game Jam Theme: "Repair"

Credits:

Robert Martinez - Production

Luis Remigio - Production

Duncan Reynolds - Programming

Justin Gallo - Programming
